code: @Manual{,   title = {sc: Real-time analysis and disease surveillance system},   author = {Richard Aubrey White and Calvin Chen-Kai Chiang and Gunnar R√∏},   year = {2022},   note = {https://docs.sykdomspulsen.no/sc, https://github.com/sykdomspulsen-org/sc}, }

title: Real-time analysis and disease surveillance system
text: Sykdomspulsen Core (‚Äúsc‚Äù) free open-source framework real-time analysis disease surveillance. Read introduction vignette run help(package="sc").

title: Real-time analysis and disease surveillance system
text: splverse set R packages developed help solve problems frequently occur performing infectious disease surveillance. want install dev versions (access packages haven‚Äôt released CRAN), run usethis::edit_r_profile() edit .Rprofile. write : Save file restart R. can now install splverse packages drat repository.
code: options(   repos = structure(c(     SPLVERSE  = "https://docs.sykdomspulsen.no/drat/",     CRAN      = "https://cran.rstudio.com"   )) ) install.packages("attrib")

what: R6 Class representing a DB schema/table ‚Äî Schema_v8
title: R6 Class representing a DB schema/table ‚Äî Schema_v8
R6 Class representing a DB schema/table ‚Äî Schema_v8
text: class representation database table. way can access data (e.g. tbl()), manipulate data (e.g. insert_data, upsert_data), manipulate structural aspects database table (e.g. add_indexes, drop_indexes).

title: R6 Class representing a DB schema/table ‚Äî Schema_v8
text: conn Database connection. db_config Configuration details database. table_name Name table database. table_name_fully_specified Fully specified name table database (e.g. [db].[dbo].[table_name]). field_types types column database table (INTEGER, DOUBLE, TEXT, BOOLEAN, DATE, DATETIME). field_types_with_length field_types (100) added end TEXT fields. keys combination variables uniquely identify row database. keys_with_length keys (100) added end TEXT fields. indexes named list vectors (generally "ind1", "ind2", etc.) improves speed data retrieval operations database table. validator_field_contents function validates data inserted database. info Free text information DB schema. load_folder temporary folder used write data inserting database. censors named list censors. load_folder_fn function generates load_folder.

title: R6 Class representing a DB schema/table ‚Äî Schema_v8
R6 Class representing a DB schema/table ‚Äî Schema_v8
text: Schema_v8$new() Schema_v8$load_folder_fn() Schema_v8$print() Schema_v8$cat_status() Schema_v8$is_connected() Schema_v8$connect() Schema_v8$disconnect() Schema_v8$create_table() Schema_v8$drop_table() Schema_v8$insert_data() Schema_v8$upsert_data() Schema_v8$drop_all_rows() Schema_v8$drop_rows_where() Schema_v8$keep_rows_where() Schema_v8$drop_all_rows_and_then_upsert_data() Schema_v8$drop_all_rows_and_then_insert_data() Schema_v8$tbl() Schema_v8$print_dplyr_select() Schema_v8$get_config_last_updated() Schema_v8$add_indexes() Schema_v8$drop_indexes() Schema_v8$db_connect() Schema_v8$db_disconnect() Schema_v8$clone()

text: conn Database connection (generally leave empty). db_config Configuration details database. table_name Name table database. field_types types column database table (INTEGER, DOUBLE, TEXT, BOOLEAN, DATE, DATETIME). censors censors named list censors. indexes named list vectors (generally "ind1", "ind2", etc.) improves speed data retrieval operations database table. validator_field_types function validates field_types DB schema created. validator_field_contents function validates data inserted database.

title: add_task_from_config_v8 ‚Äî add_task_from_config_v8
code: add_task_from_config_v8(   name = NULL,   name_grouping = NULL,   name_action = NULL,   name_variant = NULL,   cores = 1,   permission = NULL,   plan_analysis_fn_name = NULL,   for_each_plan = NULL,   for_each_analysis = NULL,   universal_argset = NULL,   upsert_at_end_of_each_plan = FALSE,   insert_at_end_of_each_plan = FALSE,   action_fn_name,   data_selector_fn_name = NULL,   schema = NULL,   info = NULL )

title: add_task_from_config_v8 ‚Äî add_task_from_config_v8
text: name Name task (dont use) name_grouping Name task (grouping) name_action Name task (action) name_variant Name task (variant) cores Number CPU cores permission permission R6 instance plan_analysis_fn_name name function returns named list list(for_each_plan = list(), for_each_analysis = NULL). for_each_plan list, unit corresponds one data extraction. Generally recommended use plnr::expand_list. for_each_analysis list, unit corresponds one analysis within plan (data extraction). Generally recommended use plnr::expand_list. universal_argset list, argsets applied analyses univerally upsert_at_end_of_each_plan want upsert results automatically end plan? insert_at_end_of_each_plan want insert results automatically end plan? action_fn_name name function called analysis arguments data, argset, schema data_selector_fn_name name function called obtain data analysis. function must arguments argset, schema must return named list. schema named list maps sc::config$schemas use action_fn_name data_selector_fn_name info Information documentation

task_from_config ‚Äî task_from_config
code: task_from_config(   name,   type,   cores = 1,   db_table = NULL,   filter = "",   for_each_plan = NULL,   for_each_argset = NULL,   upsert_at_end_of_each_plan = FALSE,   insert_at_end_of_each_plan = FALSE,   action,   schema = NULL,   args = NULL )

title: task_from_config ‚Äî task_from_config
text: name Name task type Type task ("data","single", "analysis", "ui") cores Number cores run task db_table Database table filter Filter database table for_each_plan Create plan value for_each_argset Create argset value upsert_at_end_of_each_plan TRUE, schema$output used upsert end plan insert_at_end_of_each_plan TRUE, schema$output used insert end plan action Text schema List schema mappings args List args

what: Creating a task with DB as source ‚Äî task_from_config_v2
title: Creating a task with DB as source ‚Äî task_from_config_v2
text: function used create task source database table.

title: Creating a task with DB as source ‚Äî task_from_config_v2
code: task_from_config_v2(   name,   cores = 1,   for_each_plan,   for_each_argset = NULL,   universal_argset = NULL,   upsert_at_end_of_each_plan = FALSE,   insert_at_end_of_each_plan = FALSE,   action_name,   data_output_schemas = NULL,   data_selector_schemas = NULL,   data_selector_fn_default = NULL,   data_selector_fn_specific = NULL )

title: Creating a task with DB as source ‚Äî task_from_config_v2
text: name Name task cores Number CPU cores for_each_plan list, unit corresponds one data extraction. Generally recommended use plnr::expand_list. for_each_argset list, unit corresponds one analysis within plan (data extraction). Generally recommended use plnr::expand_list. universal_argset list, argsets applied analyses univerally upsert_at_end_of_each_plan want upsert results automatically end plan? insert_at_end_of_each_plan want insert results automatically end plan? action_name name function called analysis data_output_schemas named list maps config$schemas use receiving output data_selector_schemas named list maps config$schemas use providing data plan data_selector_fn_default function arguments schema, argset default function extract data unit data_selector_schemas covered data_selection_fn_specific data_selector_fn_specific named list, unit contains function arguments schema, argset default function extract data specific units data_selector_schemas

title: Creating a task with DB as source ‚Äî task_from_config_v2
code: if (FALSE) { task_from_config_v2(   # name of the task   name = "ui_normomo_attrib_excel",   # number of CPU cores   cores = 1,   # each unit of the plan corresponds to one data extraction   for_each_plan = plnr::expand_list(     location_code = "norge"   ),   for_each_argset = NULL,   universal_argset = NULL,   upsert_at_end_of_each_plan = FALSE,   insert_at_end_of_each_plan = FALSE,   action_name = "sykdomspulsen::ui_normomo_attrib_excel",   data_output_schemas = NULL,   # these are the database tables we are interested in   data_selector_schemas = list(     "results_normomo_attrib_standard" = sc::config$schemas$results_normomo_attrib_standard,     "results_normomo_attrib_irr" = sc::config$schemas$results_normomo_attrib_irr   ),   # for each plan, this is the default for how the data will be extracted for each of the database tables listed above   data_selector_fn_default = function(schema, argset) {     schema$dplyr_tbl() %>%       mandatory_db_filter(         granularity_time = "week",         granularity_geo = NULL,         age = "total",         sex = "total"       ) %>%       dplyr::filter(location_code == !!argset$location_code) %>%       dplyr::filter(year >= 2020) %>%       dplyr::collect() %>%       as.data.table()   },   # for each plan, specific data extractor functions can be given for each database tables listed above   data_selector_fn_specific = list(     results_normomo_attrib_irr = function(schema, argset) {       schema$dplyr_tbl() %>%         mandatory_db_filter(           granularity_time = "season",           granularity_geo = NULL,           age = "total",           sex = "total"         ) %>%         dplyr::filter(location_code == !!argset$location_code) %>%         dplyr::filter(year >= 2020) %>%         dplyr::collect() %>%         as.data.table()     }   ) ) }

what: Creating a task from config (v3) ‚Äî task_from_config_v3
title: Creating a task from config (v3) ‚Äî task_from_config_v3
Creating a task from config (v3) ‚Äî task_from_config_v3
code: task_from_config_v3(   name = NULL,   name_grouping = NULL,   name_action = NULL,   name_variant = NULL,   cores = 1,   plan_argset_fn_name = NULL,   for_each_plan = NULL,   for_each_argset = NULL,   universal_argset = NULL,   upsert_at_end_of_each_plan = FALSE,   insert_at_end_of_each_plan = FALSE,   action_fn_name,   data_selector_fn_name = NULL,   schema = NULL,   info = NULL )

title: Creating a task from config (v3) ‚Äî task_from_config_v3
text: name Name task (dont use) name_grouping Name task (grouping) name_action Name task (action) name_variant Name task (variant) cores Number CPU cores plan_argset_fn_name name function returns named list list(for_each_plan = list(), for_each_argset = NULL). for_each_plan list, unit corresponds one data extraction. Generally recommended use plnr::expand_list. for_each_argset list, unit corresponds one analysis within plan (data extraction). Generally recommended use plnr::expand_list. universal_argset list, argsets applied analyses univerally upsert_at_end_of_each_plan want upsert results automatically end plan? insert_at_end_of_each_plan want insert results automatically end plan? action_fn_name name function called analysis arguments data, argset, schema data_selector_fn_name name function called obtain data analysis. function must arguments argset, schema must return named list. schema named list maps sc::config$schemas use action_fn_name data_selector_fn_name info Information documentation

text: name Name task action_fn function arguments schema, argset default function extract data unit data_selector_schemas covered data_selection_fn_specific

title: Creating an inline task ‚Äî task_inline_v1
code: if (FALSE) { task_inline_v1(   # name of the task   name = "ui_normomo_attrib_excel",   # inline function that will run   action_fn = function(data, argset, schema) {     print(1)   } ) }

title: Shortcut to data within plan within task ‚Äî tm_get_data
text: Named list, elements come data_selector_fn. One extra named element called 'hash'. 'hash' contains data hashes particular datasets/variables, calculated method 'get_data' inside plnr::Plan. 'hash' contains four named elements, : current (hash named list returned data_selector_fn) current_elements (hash named elements within named list returned data_selector_fn) last_run ('current', except last successful run) last_run_elements ('current_elements', except last successful run)

sc 8.0.2
text: Allows multiple databases used different access levels. copy_into_new_table_where now also copies indexes. V8 schemas now nice print function. V8 redirects now nice print function. copy_into_new_table_where uses tablock. upsert_at_end_of_each_plan insert_at_end_of_each_plan can now take named lists return value action_fn. Custom progressr handler.

title: sc 8.0.1
text: using sc::add_task_from_config_v8 schema list checked make sure actually schemas. solve issue people incorrectly add non-existent schemas task. insert_data, upsert_data, drop_all_rows_and_then_insert_data now recommended ways inserting data addin_load_production schemas now use load_folder_fn, dynamically check user permission write folder, solving permissions errors Including tm_get_schema_names granularity_time granularity_geo now included db censors Requires R >= 4.1.0 sc::config026plan_attempt_index now exists. running plans parallel, plan fails retried five times. lets user track attempt . mostly useful emails smses sent sc::config$plan_attempt_index==1 (Disabled) TABLOCK disabled right now due issues data uploaded. (Disabled) Data sorted sending bcp speed /upserts.

title: sc 8.0.0
text: Release schema redirects allow restricted anonymous datasets seamlessly used people different access rights Consistent naming task_from_config_v8 add_schema_v8

title: sc 7.1.4
text: db_insert_data, db_upsert_data, db_drop_all_rows_and_then_upsert_data now recommended ways inserting data

title: sc 7.1.3
text: update_config_datetime get_config_datetime now automatically record database table updates well

title: sc 7.1.2
text: Updating default db schemas explicit useage isotime.

title: sc 7.1.0
text: task_from_config_v3 sets new direction creation tasks management tasks describe_tasks describe_schemas help automatic documentation

title: sc 7.0.8
text: task_inline_v1 allows easy inline task creation Corresponding RStudio addin inline tasks copy one db table another

title: sc 7.0.7
text: copy_into_new_table_where allows creation new table old table Including task_from_config_v2 First RStudio addin

title: sc 7.0.6
text: write_data_infile now checks Infinite/NaN values sets NA

title: sc 7.0.4
text: validator_field_contents_sykdomspulsen now allows baregion valid granularity_geo

title: sc 7.0.3
text: tm_get_plans_argsets_as_dt provides overview plans argsets within task

title: sc 7.0.2
text: keep_rows_where now also retains PK constraints
